price: Na wanao jitahidi kuzipinga Aya zetu hao ndio watu wa Motoni.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوۡاْ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
footnotes: Na wale walio jikukusa nafsi zao katika kuipiga vita Qur'ani kushindana na Waumini na kuwapinga, wakitamani na kudai kwa uwongo, kwamba wao watapata wayatakayo - watu hao watabaki milele katika adhabu ya Motoni.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna saʿaw fī āyātinā muʿājizīna ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
